compliant.section: We do not share Personal Information with third parties for the third parties' marketing purposes.
compliant.legal provisions: lawful basis for processing (consent), right to object to direct marketing

compliant.section: To opt out of receiving marketing-related correspondence from NUVOTON, please update your email and contact preferences in your account/profile on our website or click "Unsubscribe" from any marketing or promotional email or text message you receive from us.
compliant.legal provisions: right to object to direct marketing

non_compliant.section: We consider a minor to by anyone under the age of 18, or such younger age as many be specified by applicable data protection laws.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services
non_compliant.amend: The GDPR sets the age of consent at 16, but allows member states to lower it to no less than 13.  The policy should state a specific age and ensure it complies with both the GDPR and applicable member state laws. For example: "We consider a minor to be anyone under the age of 16.  However, if applicable data protection laws in your country set a lower age of consent (no lower than 13), we will comply with that lower age."
